reviewtext: I've used this camera for a while now.  Pictures are good quality, and with the price of compactflash comming down it's a good deal.  My only gripe is the compactflash slot is very fragile.  If you switch cards a lot it may break.  In such a case you'll have to send kodak your camera, and they will send you a refurb back.I frankly was disapointed that my month old camera in great condition was replaced with a refurb that was obviously much older with obvious signs of wear and tear, plus a couple dead pixels on the display.  All of which are considered "okay" by Kodak.  I really felt like I paid a new camera price for a used camera.
summary: Good Feature Set, But Easy To Break
